_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: CloudNetV4
author: mail@open-issues-on-github.de
description: A modern application that can dynamically and easily deliver Minecraft oriented software For more Information visit https://github.com/CloudNetService/CloudNet Egg made by @lostesburger

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
# Cloudnet Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server
CLOUDNET_VERSION="$(echo "$CLOUDNET_VERSION" | tr -d ' ')"

# Fetch download link

if [ ! -z "${CLOUDNET_VERSION}" ]; then
    DOWNLOAD_LINK="https://github.com/CloudNetService/CloudNet-v3/releases/download/4.0.0-RC${CLOUDNET_VERSION}/CloudNet.zip"
    fi
    # Downloading zip
echo -e "Downloading CloudNet version ${CLOUDNET_VERSION}"
echo -e "Download link is ${DOWNLOAD_LINK}"

if [ ! -z "${DOWNLOAD_LINK}" ]; then
  if curl --output /dev/null --silent --head --fail ${DOWNLOAD_LINK}; then
    echo -e "zip download link is valid."
  else
    echo -e "link is invalid. Exiting now"
    exit 2
  fi
else
  echo -e "no download link provided. Exiting now"
  exit 3
fi

echo -e "Download CloudNet pack.\n"
curl -sSL ${DOWNLOAD_LINK} -o CloudNet.zip

if [ ! -e "/config.json" ]; then
    echo -e "config.json not found!\n"
    touch config.json
fi
    
echo -e "Installing CloudNet...\n"
unzip -o CloudNet.zip || { echo -e "\nInstall failed using Cloudnet version ${CLOUDNET_VERSION}."; exit 4; }

echo -e "Deleting CloudNet.zip file.\n"
rm -rf CloudNet.zip

echo -e "Installation process is completed"
echo -e " "
echo -e "\e[31m Please take a look at my github page before starting the setup. \e[0m"
echo -e "\e[32m https://github.com/Lostes-Burger/Docker/tree/main/pterodactyl/eggs/cloudnet#important \e[0m"
